name: Zombie Sniper-FPS Frontier War
description:
The whole city was infected with the zombie virus. Infection of fast, everyone will be a zombie bites, all biological scientists, strategists, government officials and other scientists, etc. After an exchange that has been surrounded by deep into zombie lab to find the antidote is the ultimate solution.

Load your weapon and get ready for the Apocalypse. The plague of the living dead is back and your mission is to annihilate it. Fight for your life and don't get bitten!

Become a professional zombie killer and test your shooting skills to survive in more than 120 levels!

HUGE VARIETY OF ZOMBIES AND WEAPONS

A dangerous vaccine has caused a powerful virus that mutates humans into zombies. This lethal virus has spread out causing a zombie outbreak, meaning that humans are in danger. Survivors must fight in this war to escape from death... Turn yourself into a zombie killer and make your way through a number of challenging levels!
